website_summaries.verdict: Well-made and stylish, but it may not appeal to consumers who prefer contemporary or more spacious styles.
pros: mid-century look with contrasting walnut wood and white veneer
cons: With one drawer and no shelf, it has less space than some others
It's also on the short side, though some consumers like that fact

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!! #noregrets
customer_reviews.text: Everyone else has said it, but I'll say it again. If you are looking for a QUALITY nightstand, that not only looks super stylish but is easy as pie to assemble... this is the nightstand for you. Legs come inside the drawer and all you have to do is screw them on and you are totally DONE. 2 minute job. These are price-wise comparable to something you'd get at Walmart and have to spend 2 hours assembling but these will last you for YEARS. One of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon, not one negative thing to say. BUY THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The BEST END TABLE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Are you looking for a nice looking, easy to put together end table that won't break the BANK! Then you don't need to look any further, I'm telling you this is a freaking awesome table! I ordered 2 and I'll be ordering another 2. The only negative would be that it doesn't come in black! Don't believe how easy it is to assemble watch my video! Positives: Price+++ Assembly+++ Look+++ Negatives (if anything could be negative) Color (Not in black)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I had mediocre expectations - I have real wood furniture and older, solid furniture in my home...so what could a factory manufactured table bring? Well, this table surprised me!! It's solid and really lovely! The drawer is not as 'solid' as the rest of the table, BUT it is still very nice. And, as you can gather from my pics, it is EASY to assemble! I LOVE THIS TABLE!! It's worth what I spent...and I will be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Easy Assembly! Seriously, it couldn't get easier. The legs are inside the drawer, for shipping. Pull them out, screw them in and you're done. All in all, to un-box, assemble and stand up - you are looking at under 5 minutes. They are quite sturdy, to boot. Have a nice clean, streamline look. Drawers open and close nicely. Good deal for the money, I'm pleased. And not having 412 parts and two hours of assembly with instructions that nobody could follow is a HUGE bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ~Ali~

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Shipped very quickly and arrived in perfect condition. After much deliberation and careful measurements, I bought this nightstand to replace a chair I'd been using beside my bed for the last few months. I'd say that the price is comparable to IKEA but I enjoy the style of this nightstand much more than what they're offering currently. The quality is pretty good too - it arrived basically in one solid piece and the only construction required was a simple twisting in the legs at the base.
customer_reviews.author: m0nstera

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, SUPER easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Looks really cool, is insanely easy to build, and is the perfect height for a nightstand. First, this is the easiest piece of furniture I have ever built. Screw in four legs and you are DONE. Second, it looks really nice. Very clean, modern. The drawer easily pulls in and out. Enough room for a book, kindle, charging cable, and other necessary bedside items you would prefer to not keep on top of the table. Price isn't bad for what you get. I will probably order another for the other side of the bed!
customer_reviews.author: WCD

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Incredible buy. Super high quality. All I had to do it screw in the legs. Gorgeous. Have received so many compliments. Thought for the price they would be flimsy, but they are very durable and clearly made from quality materials. Looks amazing in our living room as side tables. Drawers work great too.
customer_reviews.author: Singingafterdark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time choosing and small bedside table. After reading a million reviews on many similar styles, I bought this one. So glad I did! Its beautiful, so easily assembled and the perfect height. I recommend a million times. I will be purchasing another for my hubby’s side of the bed and possibly a third for my son’s room (who is 9) after owning this bedside table for awhile now, I still give 5 stars! Has held up well with toddlers in the house and still looks beautiful. Sturdy construction and pretty finish.
customer_reviews.author: Opm85

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: After going crazy furnishing our new house with everything under the sun, it was SO nice to open this package, slide out the drawer and easily screw in the legs and carry the completed table to the bedroom. After a nightmare of items to assemble from Amazon, I finally received a break. Constructed well. I'm not sure how long the finish is going to last if you place a perspiring glass on the top, but for the price, this side table will last long enough. Best deal I could find after combing EVERYWHERE for some mid-century tables on the cheap. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I bought this that it would be cheap looking or poor quality because the price was so good. Boy was I wrong! It is a great looking side table. Very nice size. I usually have a lamp, laptop, cell phone, and beverage sitting on top. The drawer is a bonus. It's big enough to fit most laptops with room to spare. The drawer is also several inches deep. It was very easy to assemble. Just unpack it and screw the legs on. The style is perfect for a touch of mid century modern.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Stylish End Table
customer_reviews.text: I own two items from eHomeProducts and am looking at ordering more. Like the console I own, this end table is inexpensive, easy to assemble, and attractive. The laminate is good quality and doesn't have the cheap look of printed peel and stick laminate often seen on inexpensive furniture. The only snag with this was that one of the leg mounts was installed incorrectly. This kept one of the legs from angling properly. It was easy enough to fix by taking off the mount and installing it in the correct orientation.
customer_reviews.author: NRH

customer_reviews.title: Great value and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this table. I thought the quality would match the low price. I was wrong. I bought these to go with a bedroom set that cost several thousand dollars. I refused to buy the accompanying nightstands at $600 each. I bought two of these instead and crossed my fingers. First, they match perfectly. Second, they look beautiful. Third, the assembly process took about a minute. As others have said, you just screw in the legs. That's it! They aren't heavy, but they certainly have some weight to them. They don't look or feel cheap. So happy I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of nightstand, for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleasantly surprised by the quality of these. Look, it’s not fine furniture by any means, but $59 bucks sure buys you a lot more than it used to. Assembly was a snap, which I appreciated after spending nearly a third of my life assembling Allen-wrench furniture. Solid wood legs, one-piece particleboard top with a convincing veneer, and one-piece drawer that won’t rattle apart thanks to a billion janky fasteners. Just screw the legs in, and you’re done. The finished product is lovely and a welcome addition to our bedroom decor. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in two different colors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these from eHomeProducts and received two nightstands that look very different. One is more orange with the color and the one was more brownish. The orange one felt more wobbly while the other brownish one was more sturdy and felt more well made. I would say they look similar but are different products to me. I sent a message to eHomeProducts and it took them days to respond and when they finally responded it wasn't really addressing what i was saying. This is so heavy that I feel lazy to return so I'm stuck with two nightstands that look different and confused on what I should do with this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie H

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much now I own 4!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing spectacular... But these days and age it is difficult find something that meets expectations. This side table is laminate but it looks good enough to fool you for its look and operation that inspire quality. I have tried other similar side table with 2 drawers but it just is insane how much assembly is required that it is insane that you have pay for such product assembling spending 5 hours putting it together. The assembly required is screwing 4 legs on the base of the table and that is it! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: everything works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This side table arrived very well packed and protected. It was assembled well -- all the edges are square, and the drawer slides in and out smoothly. The legs screwed into the brackets on the underside easily and with very good fit. To my own surprise, after fitting the legs and turning the table over, it sat perfectly lev el on the floor. No wobble! I am extremely happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Katlu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: This table looks pretty good. It is a vinyl wrap not real wood grain in case anyone is wondering, but it looks very convincing even up close and touching it. Mine arrived with damage to the front of the drawer unfortunately but I am the type of person to repaint it myself before going through the hassle of returning it. It is an easy paint repair but knocked a star or two off for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Transitional Design, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love these end tables they look great with the sorta mid century modern vibe I've been going for in my house. It was a great price and very very easy to put together, it arrive quickly too. The only drawback was that I neglected to take into account how shallow the table is, maybe 18" deep which sounds like alot but it looks small next to my couch. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: w. tyler sall

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This could be the best deal ever. These tables are great looking in person (rich wood looking finish), sturdy and all you do is twist on the legs. I was worried because the drawer is not on metal glides, but still opens and closes smoothly & perfectly. Came in a well protected package. I was looking at ones 4 times this price, that had worse wood finishes. So glad I gave these a shot. If you want a Mid century design, solid table and good looking, don't even hesitate. I just can't believe they are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: sandjam

customer_reviews.title: These look fantastic! I ordered two and am super impressed
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic! I ordered two and am super impressed. They came packaged very nicely (the legs come in the drawer) and are super easy to put together -- just twist on the legs, no tools needed. No complicated assembly or design flaws like with some other lower-price furniture on Amazon. I wish the company made more matching pieces, I'd love a desk to go with!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Spaces or Small Apartment Living
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty good, sturdy and well made. I bought a set for my bedroom because normal furniture size nightstands are too large for small apartment living. These fit in our bedroom with our king-size bed. We've had the set now for over 6 months and despite heavy usage (water spills, cold beverages etc) I haven't seen any rings or stain on the wood. I think for the price, they work remarkably well.
customer_reviews.author: Michu

customer_reviews.title: Good table at good price
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of the design and the style. The easiest piece of furniture to put together since you just twist on the legs. It arrived well packaged and undamaged. It's perfect to hold my alarm clock, lamp, and book, and calendar just on the top and the drawer is equally spacious. For the price? Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great simple and sleek nightstand that is super easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for clean, simple and modern nightstands that are a reasonable price for months. I needed two for our bedroom and I didnt want to spend a ton of money and these nightstands are great. I love how simple they are and they are really easy to assemble. The top is already put together you just have to spin on the legs. The finish looks good so far- I think its a veneer but for the price the quality is pretty nice and it goes with our bedroom decor perfectly. Nothing bad to say about these- at least so far. Good purchase- definitely happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ulin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the exact perfect size style and color what I was looking for. I only gave it four stars because the top was not attached. It had been damaged in shipping I guess and the top broke free now it's it's resting comfortably on the table but I don't like having broken Furniture so I gave it 4 stars. It was extremely easy to put together though all you have to do is screw the legs and. That was a blessed relief after assembling a whole bunch of Ikea furniture this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Some QC concerns.
customer_reviews.text: The white drawer on mine came damaged. Luckily, I wasn’t using the drawer anyway but there’s certainly some quality control issues. There are also some weird marks in the wood but it’s all underneath the finish. It’s hardly noticeable but might bother some folks. Still really nice piece and basically comes prebuilt. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome nightstand I bought two for my room. The only complaint I have is the draw just slides in and out of the stand, meaning there is no rollers or brackets. My cat has found out how to stick his paw in the open part of the drawer and pull it completely out. That’s more of a me problem but if you have a cat be aware lol. I didn’t take a star off because it is truly a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I trusted the reviews and I’m only smiles. Box arrived today, very nice and protected. Wood didn’t have a single scratch and it took me less then 5 min to put the legs in. It looks great, very sturdy. The quality is much better than I though. I’m not sure if is real wood but it definitely looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: Truly easy to assemble. Good quality. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and described. Just screw in the legs. No tools needed. After having bought a similar product from someone else, which was horrible, I was hesitant. Came very well packaged, no flaws. Very happy with the truly easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Liv M

customer_reviews.title: Good piece.  Not walnut color.
customer_reviews.text: Have had two of these for a couple of months now. They look great in the living room, are nice and sturdy (I have 3 kids, so they've been put to the test) and the corners are not as sharp as those on similar pieces I've had. My only gripe is that the wood color looks like oak, definitely not walnut. I do have other walnut furniturein the room so it's pretty obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Don Henley

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, easy to put together. Only reason not 5 star is due to some minor scuffing on one table but for the price wasn't worth the effort of sending back and only noticeable if you search for it. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these tables
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables! Assembly took 3 minutes and required taking the legs out of the box (that are stored safely in the drawer) and screwing them on the bottom. The price is so affordable that I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my nightstand so much that I purchased another one as soon s I recieved my first! It's super sturdy, perfect size, easy to assemble, and fits my midcentury style just right. It's also the cheapest piece I found at this level of quality
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for- a small night stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for- a small night stand to fit in next to my waterbed. This little table is surprisingly well made for a $50 piece of furniture and if I cover the top with a piece of beveled glass or plexiglass, even just use a coaster, this table should last many years. Also - no tools needed- you just screw in the legs! I would buy this table again and it fits well with my other furniture of contemporary, mid century, and vintage pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This table is AWESOME! Like other reviewers said, it's good quality, sturdy, great mid-century modern look, and super easy to set up - all you have to do is screw in the legs.And even without tracks, the drawer slides so nicely. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. In real life it looks small in nature but just take note of the dimensions before you buy. I still love it, as it looks like good quality and not of the cheap plywood material. Shiny wood, and SUPER easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: YYZZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing if you get ones without damage.
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables. They seem way more expensive than they are. But like the other reviews mine came damaged. They seem to be packed well but after opening I noticed the corners were damaged. Luckily it’s not super noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid table
customer_reviews.text: This table feels sturdy, was easy to assemble (3 minutes), and looks terrific. I'm really pleased with how it looks. This is the first time I've ever been this happy with an online purchase of furniture. Much better quality than a similar IKEA table I bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: TMacPhail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and well-made nightstands that are a reasonable price. Please excuse my bedroom, it’s not finished and decorated so it looks like a hotel room still ha ha. It’s made in Taiwan which is a huge plus. We ordered two and the box was super heavy but when we brought it in and unpacked it it took literally 5 minutes to assemble. Just screw the legs in and you’ve got yourself a nightstand. Highly recommend. It doesn’t feel like a cheap product either.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and perfect size. So much nicer than expected for the price. So much so, I purchased this second to match first one i got almost a year ago, for a matching pair on each aide of our guest bed. .
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This little table is exactly as beautiful and sturdy as you hope it is, based on the photos. We were SO impressed with the quality, especially considering the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: So happy about this purchase! I ordered two of these as night stands and they are great! Very sturdy, with a little bit of weight to them. As far as assembling goes, all you have to do is screw in the legs! Shipping/packing was good too. 100% recommend this lil table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Clean and Assembly was in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean and modern table with easy to manage assembly with screw in legs. Utility at present is a night stand/custom lamp table. Price, quality and aesthetic works well and does honor to the traditional pieces of furniture residing in the den. So pleased with this little table that I ordered two of them. Drawer is perfect place for a book, Ipad or manuscript in progress.
customer_reviews.author: India Marie Clamp

customer_reviews.title: I love this nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I love this nightstand! Definitely gives our bedroom a pop of midcentury modern and the shade of wood matches perfectly with my bed-frame and dresser. Easiest assembly ever. I was prepared to put everything together myself- drawer and everything- but once I opened the package and saw that it was just twist on legs, I chuckled a bit. So far so good! Seems pretty sturdy and the drawer slides in and out with no problem. I'm obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Phi N.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the non-broken parts I did receive was extremely poor -- basically cardboard
customer_reviews.text: I received a box filled with numerous broken parts and missing pieces. The quality of the non-broken parts I did receive was extremely poor -- basically cardboard. On top of this, there were no assembly instructions. Do NOT believe the reviews that state that the only assembly needed is the attachment of legs. Assembly (if possible) would likely take hours, as there are numerous (100+) pieces
customer_reviews.author: naxos8

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with these nightstands. They aren't heirloom pieces and the quality isn't amazing, however for the price they are quite solid and attractive. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Matney

customer_reviews.title: For the price there are perfect! Relatively sturdy (sure haven't sat on them or ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price there are perfect! Relatively sturdy (sure haven't sat on them or anything but they are on par with IKEA or target, if not a little better quality. The drawer slides well, the finish looks very nice. I do use a coaster for beverages but have had for several months and no scratches or anything yet. Very easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie S

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I really was surprised by the quality of the wood and the overall packaging for this product. It came compactly in a small box and the legs were inside the drawer. Assembly was as simple as screwing the legs on and putting it where it needs to go! Pros: - Great finish and color - Size was what I was expecting overall - Easy assembly Cons: - None so far
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIDE TABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Best side table I could have gotten, especially for the price! I seriously want to buy one for every room in the house it was so easy to put together (just twirl on the legs) and it’s sturdy and stylish. BAM. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey West

customer_reviews.title: Great! They match my nordli ikea dressers
customer_reviews.text: These match my Nordli Ikea dressers perfectly. Yes, they are inexpensive, but I've had these for a few months and there is no signs of peeling or anything like that. I use coasters on these. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Chambana

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money and quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The first nightstand arrived damaged, but the replacement arrived in 2 days. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. it arrived damaged. if this gets rectified I'll change review.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, looks straight out of west elm
customer_reviews.text: Super nice, matches my room perfectly. Looks like it’s much more expensive than it is, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Canada

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my little apartment! It came mostly assembled, so I was pleasantly surprised to find out all I had to do was screw in the legs. Looks great and affordable for the "mid-century modern" trend happening now.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: As expected and easy to put together. Only thing I noticed was some discoloration and a small scratch but really nothing to return it for.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price!
customer_reviews.text: These tables are awesome! The price can't be beat... I was honestly expecting pressboard type material and to have to spend an hour assembling. These are high quality and the only assembly is screwing in the legs! This is the best purchase I've ever made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy and the wood colors are very off. Cheap. Should have spent a little more and gotten something better quality
customer_reviews.author: Haley abillie-Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon nightstand (side table); minimal assembly time
customer_reviews.text: I really like these nightstands (side tables) that we bought for our apartment. They look good, hold a good amount of stuff in the drawers and are around $80 each which fit well into our budget. The side tables were so easy to put together, screw in the four legs and you are done, arrives mainly fully assembled. Very pleased with the outcome. Lasted one year so far without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JLReviews

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I got two. The price fluctuates a lot so make sure you don’t overpay. Drawers still smell a bit after a few months but I don’t really mind, it’s not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect side table!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality - putting together just requires screwing in the legs. So much better then end tables I found at target and elsewhere that cost twice as much
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Elliott

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Really great value. Fits right in in my midcentury modern living room among some higher end pieces. Couldn't have been easier to assemble-just twist on the legs, no tools required. I took out the drawer (it's not attached) and prefer that look personally, but can always slide it back in if I ever change my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: The color/finish is true to photos and looks GREAT in person
customer_reviews.text: Assembly could NOT be any easier! The color/finish is true to photos and looks GREAT in person. the quality is GREAT! Seriously, I bought 2 and my husband thought I spent too much because they were "too well made & attractive to cost what they did". We absolutely love these! 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: aubry

customer_reviews.title: Great Nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best white/walnut nightstand I've found on amazon. It's a great price, amazing quality, and easy to assemble. The box it arrives in is compact and easy to carry upstairs if necessary. The legs come in a box inside the drawer and easily screw into place. The drawer holds all my bedside necessities perfectly. The seller also promptly responds to any questions or concerns. I'm incredibly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Green

customer_reviews.title: a nice nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Is a really nice nightstand, way too easy to assemble. But i wish it was a little bit taller. if good material and everything, but is overpriced! the only reason why i pay for it is because is the only one i could find that matches with my drawer dresser.
customer_reviews.author: smpo

customer_reviews.title: super easy assembly & great looking
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly skeptical of this side table based on the price and my expectation that it would be packed flat (IKEA). But I was pleasantly surprised, the main box is completely assembled and the 4 legs only need to be screwed in - total assembly time, 3 minutes (2 minutes unpacking). 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: These look great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely look better than I thought they would. Super easy to assemble. Like literally one minute each.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great little table.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. You just have to screw in the legs. Looks great, does sit a bit lower than I thought but its still a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 they are so cute. Perfect size and lightweight. Our cane with a minor scratch but we still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Liuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish, easy to assemble: just screw in the legs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect complement to our mid century modern living room. No assembly required other than screwing the legs in. I looked at dozens, if not hundreds, of end tables online and in person, and I was glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Asher

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the end table even though the legs are just slightly uneven. Super easy to assemble, just screw in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Nomadica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy install!
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is beautiful with a modern touch! Installation was a breeze - you just screw in the legs. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Great nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy this because it’s pretty cheap, but I went ahead and got one then ended up getting a second one! It’s a lot more sturdy and well made then I thought it would be. I love it! Literally all you have to do for assembly is screw the legs in, takes maybe a Minute!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby jackson

customer_reviews.title: I heart this table!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a side table that had a nice size drawer, ample table top space, and was easy to put together. I was not disappointed in the super easy assembly and chic side table. I like looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: CatMarcs

customer_reviews.title: TV base!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to house the cable box under my TV, on a black dresser. Very sturdy box & perfect dimensions. I threw away the legs & drawer, painted it black & it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: BEST SIDE TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I am really shocked at the quality for the money with this table. It is amazing! I had this in my cart for 2 years and finally decided to go for it, they arrived in perfect condition and exactly as shown. All you do is screw the legs on and your done. They are lightweight, but also sturdy. I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! It looks gorgeous and has the easiest assembly ever. You just twist all four legs in! It has a great glossy finish and is super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, man
customer_reviews.text: A very solid piece of furniture for the price. Almost no assembly, drawer glides seamlessly. You won't find a better option out there in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful MCM night stand/end table!
customer_reviews.text: I own a staging and design business and LOVE this table. I’ve purchased maybe 6 of these now for clients.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and I am beyond impressed. After reading multiple 5 star reviews, I ordered this piece and I am sure glad I did. It was SO easy to assemble, it took me about 2 minutes!! It looks so great and it totally a steal for the price. You will be so happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for a Little Buck!
customer_reviews.text: These are KILLER!!! You just screw in the legs- and BAM. done. Beautiful, mid-century modern, cute- and a nice heavy wood that looks like it cost at LEAST $150 per table (vs. $66 bucks)- Amazon these tables knock it outta the park. So glad I bought these!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique French

customer_reviews.title: Like others have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, WOW! What a find. These are so inexpensive and look like they are worth more. It is solid and sturdy. Enough room on the top to put a lamp, laptop and my phone. It's actually roomier than I expected it to be! EXTREMELY easy to put together. Just screw in the legs, and voila! We got 2 and use them as night stands. Great for mcm decor. I cannot recommend these more.
customer_reviews.author: Errin J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Great little end table. Easy to assemble: just screw in the legs, which feel very sturdy. Sliding out the drawer could be smoother, but it's good enough for not being on rails. Might buy a 2nd one for the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kuzdemmer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made and usable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, well made table. The perfect size for my grandson's bedside or as a side table for a chair or sofa in the living room or family room. It is so sturdy and extremely easy to assemble. Just screw the legs into the bottom of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Medeck

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: So cool and easy to put together. This piece was the finishing touch we were looking for in between our mid century modern chairs. Love it! Took me one minute to put together which is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and I'm thinking of getting more. They arrived in perfect condition and I put them together in 5 minutes. They look like they were much more expensive than they were. The drawers slide easily and the finishes are very nice. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. MITSAKOS

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get!
customer_reviews.text: So far really like this pc. It was even more exciting that all I had to do was put the legs on. It feels really sturdy it doesn't feel like it's cheap wood...exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Davis

customer_reviews.title: Installed in 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and look for the price. I don't consider myself handy but installation is SO EASY and took me 10 minutes max. Just flip the table upside down and slowly screw legs into bottom of the table. We are careful not to have liquid spill on top of them and so far no peeling at surface.
customer_reviews.author: kevindonut

customer_reviews.title: It is very pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you can screw things on, you will be able to get this up. Just open the drawer, get the legs out, and screw them on. It is very pretty and sturdy. Something at this price is unlikely to come with drawer slides, so I was not disappointed there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Best received gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 23 year old daughter for her birthday, she had requested it on Elfster. She absolutely loves it and said it was a breeze to put together.
customer_reviews.author: jhg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice nightstands with modern design
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something simple and these are so nice, sturdy, easy to assemble. Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene E Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood & super classy!
customer_reviews.text: Surprising for such inexpensive tables- these are solid sturdy wood, easy to assemble (just screwing in the legs), and look classy in my master bedroom. I was going for an “elegant meets mcm” vibe and this table fits right in.
customer_reviews.author: hannabanana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little nightstands
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these nightstands! They’re a really nice quality and look perfect in our bedroom. Our room isn’t overly mid century modern, but they blend in seamlessly. I would highly encourage you to purchase them!
customer_reviews.author: liz k

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but not cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful set! We bought two for our bedroom and they were super easy to put together, they look awesome and they are very sturdy. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ashly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, look expensive, & very well made! We purchased another!
customer_reviews.author: HB Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for any room
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! This was the easiest piece of furniture I've ever assembled. Slip it out of the box, screw in the legs, and done. I bought some velvet sticky liner for inside the drawers to keep things from sliding around. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem Indeed
customer_reviews.text: A hidden gem indeed, especially when its name is spelled as "nighstand" :) Very happy with the overall quality of the piece. It has a slightly glossy finish which looks very nice. The drawer has no rail but slides pretty well. For installation, all that's needed is putting the four legs on, which takes no time. Of course, there can be some improvements: the drawer bottom is really thin which doesn't seem to be able to hold heavy items; the edge of the body can be better polished so it's more smooth. But comparing it with some other more expensive ones I bought online, this one is a winner for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelCretu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look and no labor to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for the bedroom and loved them! They look exactly like the photo. Very easy to put together. The top is already built. You just twist the legs in. The drawers are deep. Worth every penny!! Basically no labor to put them together. Ready in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E.

customer_reviews.title: Doll House
customer_reviews.text: This was made for a tiny house. This was so small, but it was easy to put together and sturdy that was definitely a fact it was just so small.
customer_reviews.author: LeafMeAloene

customer_reviews.title: Great value, stylish, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find these great value mid century style nightstands for our guest bedroom. These were incredibly easy to assemble especially compared to other nightstands in a similar price range I have purchased in the past. These came with the tabletop/drawer part already together, with the four legs in the drawer ready to be screwed on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The drawer does not have sliders but I don’t mind because it is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The end table is perfect for small rooms and does not take much space at all. I use the drawer to store my eye glasses and cross stitch project. This piece was easy to assemble because all I had to do was screw in the legs. I love the mid century look because it is simple and timeless. You won’t regret buying this stand night.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Benavente

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, super easy to assemble (just screw in legs) in less than 5 min. Super happy with it. Looks very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

product_meta.title: Light Walnut/White Side End Table Nighstand with Drawer 22.5" H
product_meta.description: Combining solid/composite wood construction with a tidy and practical style, this versatile end table/night stand makes a fresh and clean addition to the room. The over-sized tabletop features curved edges rectangular shape, while below the four legs supports the table top. Comes in light walnut and white finish makes it stand out. Features drawers for storage. Measures 19"W X 16"D x 22.5"H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars607 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
